sentences.sContent: Despite their superficial similarities, the two novels are, in fact, very different.
sentences.sCn: 这两本小说尽管表面上有相似之处，但实际上大不一样。

sentences.sContent: They only have the most superficial understanding of prison life.
sentences.sCn: 他们对监狱生活只有最粗浅的了解。

sentences.sContent: ...Deep reading - as opposed to the often superficial reading we do on the Web-is an endangered practice...

synos.tran: 表面文章；外表；浅薄的人

remMethod.val: super(在…上面) ＋ fic(做) ＋ ial → 表面的

words.tran: 浅薄，肤浅；表面性的事物

trans.tranOther: seeming to have a particular quality, although this is not true or real
